description: Generate survey listings from NPD files with route alignment, tide corrections, smoothing, and multiple export formats (Excel, DXF, PDF).
author: Fathom OS
CertificateStatement: This is to certify that the survey listing data documented herein has been processed and verified using FathomOS Survey Listing Generator in accordance with industry standards for hydrographic data processing.
features: NPD file parsing with column mapping
Interactive survey editor with CAD tools
Excel, DXF, PDF, and text export
